title: Anton Meier Ebsen Jørgensen – Map
description: Interactive map of selected places I've been: travels, events, and studies.

hero.title: Places I've Been
hero.lead: A small visual overview of travels, events, and studies. Click a pin for details.

filters.title: Filters
filters.text: Select a category to filter pins. You can also zoom and pan.
filters.hint: Tip: Add new pins via the Dashboard (Category: Hjem, Rejser, Studier, Arbejde).

list.title: Places
list.empty: Map is empty. Add locations in Dashboard.
